data.default_dashboard_path: The default dashboard for newly added devices.
data.device_name_storage_key: The key used to store the device name in local storage.
data.event_type: The event type to listen to which contains the result of an Assist interaction. Used to update the intent sensor.

navigate_url.name: Navigate to a URL
navigate_url.description: Navigate to any URL in the remote assist display.

navigate.name: Navigate
navigate.description: Navigate to a Home Assistant dashboard in the remote assist display.

path.name: Path
path.description: The path of the dashboard to navigate to.
